mapper.select: SELECT id, name, phone, open_id AS openId, nick_name AS nickName, head_cover AS headCover FROM WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( id, name, phone, open_id, nick_name, head_cover, create_date, creator, create_ip ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{openId}, #{nickName}, #{headCover}, NOW(), #{creator}, #{createIp} )
